Package ohos.ai.cv.text

Class TextConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.ai.cv.common.VisionConfiguration
      • ohos.ai.cv.text.TextConfiguration

  • public class TextConfiguration
extends VisionConfiguration
    Configures parameters for Text.

    This class inherits from VisionConfiguration and includes configurations of the language type, detection type, and detection result.

    Since:
    1

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  TextConfiguration.Builder
      A nested class used to create a TextConfiguration object.
      static class  TextConfiguration.TextShape
      An enumeration class used to store text shapes.

        public int getTrackingForceOcrFlag​()
        Checks whether to forcibly detect text during text tracking.
